website_summaries.verdict: Going by older detection and removal numbers, Trend Micro AntiVirus plus AntiSpyware offers competent if basic security protection. However, so do many free competitors. This year, we recommend giving Trend Micro AntiVirus plus AntiSpyware 2010 a pass.
pros: Trend Micro AntiVirus plus AntiSpyware 2010 offers basic antivirus and antispyware protection
cons: This stripped-down program from Trend Micro lacks many of the bells and whistles that made its siblings worth considering

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good value
customer_reviews.text: Trend Micro is one of the top security programs out there and it's a constant battle among Norton, McAfee and Trend Micro. The 2010 version, similar to Norton, shows lots of improvement. Faster and less intrusive. Also, I like the fact you can download the trial and then activate with the code from the box. A few annoyances about the program are the fact that it forces you to activate the program--which some consider a privacy violation. Additionally, the interface is confusing with constant upsells to purchase other options. For those that want another option besides Norton, this is a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Greenbaum

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE: Not a full version, 30 day "Bestbuy" trial
customer_reviews.text: The expiration date of the software shows as being only 30 days after I installed it. It also indicates it is a "Bestbuy" version of the software. I am asking for the seller "mjentertainment" to make this right and will update my review ASAP. UPDATE: Seller sent me a gobbledygook response to my complaint. BUYER BEWARE this is not a full version of the software
customer_reviews.author: TedO

customer_reviews.title: Good product-- beats Norton and McAfee bloatware!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this on my Windows XP box for months now and am quite happy. It is well-designed, unobtrusive, does a good job, and does not use a lot of system resources, unlike many of the competing AV packages currently on the market. I recommend this if you want a simple easy-to-use program.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Kuttner

customer_reviews.title: Quality antivirus
customer_reviews.text: Nothing bad to say about this product. Simple, easy to install, and protected my comp well. Never had any issues while it was installed. Whne this one expired I renewed it for another year.
customer_reviews.author: jrdraga

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Trend Micro is the best Antivirus software I have used. I have purchased several copies and several versions over several years. Would like the see the subscription price down closer to the product price!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Purvis

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Experience
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product and tried to download it 5-6 times and it never worked. I got the access key and had to go to the Trend Micro site to download the trial version and put the key in to make it work. Three days after I installed, I got the worst virus I've ever had!!! Blue screen and kept rebooting. I uninstalled and got Webroot again since I had it for the previous 3 years. I was trying to be cheap and got trend mico to save 20 bucks and it was not worth it. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Deveraux

customer_reviews.title: Worst A/V software I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the major brands I've used (Norton, McAfee, AVG,) Trend Micro has been the most unstable program I've encountered. Program shuts down for no reason and needs a system restart to correct, or does not launch at system startup. Have updated to latest version available, reviewed KB for fixes, submitted resolution requests to TM support, and still no fixes available. I'm giving up after 3 months of disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: danno70

customer_reviews.title: return user
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for the better part of eight years and continue returning because it runs in the background is easily programed and is not a sistem hog as others I have tried in the pst. a good antivirus for those who prefer these features in a computer antivirus program.
customer_reviews.author: d_paniolo

customer_reviews.title: Trend Antivirus
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. This is one of the best anti-virus software I have used. It is easy to install. I saved over half of the retail price, including the shipping charges. Actually I have oreded two of the anti-viruses. I will be back again. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Luce

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted one month
customer_reviews.text: purchased this and exactly one month from purchase date it shows expired. NO where does it show that this is a trial and that it will expire in 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Trend Antivirus software
customer_reviews.text: I gave this software to my son and so far he says it seems to be working fine.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Tren Micro Anti Virus
customer_reviews.text: The software was very easy to install, works much faster than the old Mcafee program I had before. Updates are efficient and scans are completed quickly. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Trend Antivirus
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Initially had a difficult time downloading it, but that may be due to my computer. So far it's working great.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Depends on How Safe you Surf
customer_reviews.text: I don't download files from sources that aren't well know or open web pages if they lag or appear to have questionable content. I have this rather limited program on one of my work computers and it has not suffered because of it. For the purposes of the average adult user I have found it to be safe and effective in preventing viruses and spyware infections. I have used it for several months now without incident. If you frequently open email from unknown sources or freely download attachments from friends who like to forward things, you may want more protection than this. You get what you pay for and this one does not scan email and other attachments.
customer_reviews.author: bunnyrabbit4

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't Install
customer_reviews.text: I jumped at the chance to get the latest and greatest anti-virus software, but, unfortunately, was met with nothing but trouble. Maybe it's due to my setup of running Parallels on an Intel iMac with a copy of Windows XP, but I was never able to get the product to install. Inserting the disc certainly opened up the installation app, but it kept crashing. I tried countless times, applied various updates to XP, Parallels, and nothing ever worked. Pretty disappointing. Even attempting to contact Trend MIcro wasn't any help. Maybe others have had better luck, but I'd probably suggest sticking with a free virus app like AVG, or even just going with Norton/McAfee's solutions.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Better than my Norton!
customer_reviews.text: Just in time - my Norton sub was expiring, so I installed Trend Micro on my WIN XP PC. What a difference! Norton was obtrusive - always raising it's virtual hand. For example, I'm installing a program, yes, I know the program is safe, so why notify me and block installation until I approve? TrendMicro, on the other hand, is in the background, quietly working. Another big plus, TrendMicro does not use as much system memory resources as Norton. An improvement, gets an A+ from me.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Best Internet Protection Available!
customer_reviews.text: I don't care what others say, Trend Micro has been the best I've used since I got online in th last 12 years with my sony vaio. It has never give me an issue and I trust it wholeheartedly. I've tried other top names over the years and Trend Micro has been the most consistent, reliable, and get-it-done protection. It's easy to use and so far I've never had a breach since using it. It runs in the background and sometimes so quietly I forget it's there.
customer_reviews.author: Pink Breadsticks

customer_reviews.title: Another fine product by the Trend Micro folks.
customer_reviews.text: I've used Trend Micro products for a number of years and overall, they are very good products. The level of protection is very good and the user-frendliness is excellent. This software does take up quite a bit of space on my laptop and does bog it down when running while I'm working on other software. I have tried other antivirus products that were less cumbersome, but not many that I felt as protected with.
customer_reviews.author: deand73

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Well, this was the easiest piece of software I have had to install in a long time. Normally with the AV software something needs to be removed, something doesn't work or isn't compatible. This...no problem. As for how it works, none of them are perfect but this seems to not be as much as a resource hog as others on the market. Anyway, for simple, easy to use protection for the computer, this isn't bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Helsing

customer_reviews.title: protection
customer_reviews.text: The program does what it advertises. Keeps your computer safe and as a plus this version is slightly faster than previous editions. For the price you pay for the program it is a good deal. There are programs that will do a better job but you will definitely pay more for them. You always get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Kurupt

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Recently my son's laptop crashed, and I had to re-load Windows to make it functional again. Working on the theory that some little nasty got by my anti virus program I thought I'd give Trend a shot. It was a very easy install and seems to be working well.
customer_reviews.author: G. E. Williams

customer_reviews.title: lightweight, effective antivirus protection
customer_reviews.text: It works simply, effectively in the background. I don't have any of the annoying problems that I have had with Norton and McAfee. Since I have not had any viruses or other attacks, I can only assume that it is doing its job well. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sam I Am

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonders and Updates are a Major Help (Win7 compatible)
customer_reviews.text: This is the Latest version of Trend Micro's Antivirus/Antispyware software. It is basically last year's version, but with the latest updates and compatibility for Win7. As you can see by last year's version, the reviews are mostly praising both this product and its company (more 5 stars than any other stars). ] I would agree with the positive reviewers, as this product does have much to offer. The price is just right as well, and its well worth the money for the protection. A+ product.
customer_reviews.author: Producter

customer_reviews.title: Their all the same
customer_reviews.text: I had a different antivirus sent to me a while back. Honestly their all the same. You can download AVG for free and it is just as good as the ones you pay for and I know a lot of computer places that build computers install AVG instead of making customers pay.
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: this is a very good product. Works good and does what it is supposed to do. My computer works smoothly. recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lostplanet

customer_reviews.title: Same old stuff
customer_reviews.text: Nothing new to report, if you have ever owned an anti virus system then you have seen this before, sure there are a few new bells & whistles but they are superficial at best. You can't go wrong with this product over a competitor. Not great but not bad at all...
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy Vee

customer_reviews.title: Made my computer run extremely slow
customer_reviews.text: Installed this and had noticeably slow startup, run time and internet time. Removed it almost as fast as I put it on.
customer_reviews.author: John Grove

customer_reviews.title: just 30 days
customer_reviews.text: I installed it 01/18/12 and its saying that the expiration date is 02/18/12 really brought from mjentertenment for 3.99 if I know that they was going to just take my money I would have brought something else
customer_reviews.author: nicole

product_meta.title: Trend Micro Antivirus + Antispyware 2010
product_meta.description:
Platform:PC Disc| Format:BoxTrend Micro AntiVirus Plus AntiSpyware is the essential security you need to safeguard all your data and files. With automatic scans, updates and outbreak alerts, you can rest easy knowing you have systematic, ongoing protection against the latest malicious viruses, worms, Trojan horse programs, and spyware.

AMAZON.COM
Trend Micro AntiVirus + AntiSpyware is the essential security you need so you can email and share files with confidence. You can rest easy knowing you have ongoing, easy-to-use protection against the latest malicious viruses, worms, Trojan horse programs, and spyware.

The essential security you need so you can email and share files with confidence. Click to enlarge. 

An award-winning anti-virus engine protects against computer viruses, worms, Trojan horse programs, and related security threats. Click to enlarge. 

ESSENTIAL DEFENSE AGAINST VIRUSES AND SPYWARE
Key Features:


 * Anti-virus 
 * Anti-spyware 
 * Email safety scan 
 * Protection against rootkits 
 * Proactive intrusion blocking 
 * Free phone, email, and online chat support (North America only) 

Security made easy
This product is the right choice if you or the people in your home do these things online: 

 * Browse web pages 
 * Send and receive email 
 * Exchange instant messages 

FEATURES OF TREND MICRO ANTIVIRUS + ANTISPYWARE
Protects against current and future viruses
An award-winning anti-virus engine protects against computer viruses, worms, Trojan horse programs, and related security threats. Automatic updates immunize you against new computer virus outbreaks for the full duration of your subscription. 

Defends your personal information with anti-spyware technology
Powerful anti-spyware technology guards your personal information and privacy against spyware, rootkits, and other malicious software. 

Provides real-time protection with automated computer scans
On-demand, scheduled and real-time scanning options actively protect your computer from viruses or spyware in files, incoming and outgoing mail, webmail, and instant messages. 

Prevents unauthorized changes
Improved security policies find and stop unwanted attempts to change your operating system and critical software. 

Quarantines suspicious files
Trend Micro AntiVirus + AntiSpyware isolates potential or un-cleanable threats in a quarantine folder rather than deleting them immediately, allowing you to recover specific files and programs. 

Cleans browser history, cookies, and unnecessary files
Protect your privacy by removing records listing recently opened websites, and allows you to manage web browser cookies and temporary files deposited on your computer from websites. 

Provides customizable security warnings
Decide how often you want to receive warnings about security threats. 

Includes free product support
Get FREE phone, email, and online chat support with your annual subscription.
feature_bullets: Trend Micro AntiVirus + AntiSpyware provides ongoing, easy-to-use protection against the latest malicious viruses, worms, Trojan horse programs, and spyware
Powerful anti-spyware technology guards your personal information and privacy against spyware, rootkits, and other malicious software
Improved security policies find and stop unwanted attempts to change your operating system and critical software
Automatic updates immunize you against new computer virus outbreaks for the full duration of your subscription
Get FREE phone, email, and online chat support with your annual subscription
